html:
7.15.20  4:01 am   do you ever ask these questions so you can set yourself up for a pun

      absolutely knot

7.15.20  3:48 am   What's your favorite video you haven't made?

      window washer

7.15.20  3:30 am   when writing your songs, do you write the lyrics or melody first?

      no way

7.15.20  3:20 am   What is the funniest thing you ever did 

      rode off into the sunrise

7.15.20  3:06 am   Do you have a high IQ?

      it depends which answers i choose

7.15.20  3:04 am   Do you have a favorite sample/instrument to use when making music?

      maybe one of the banjos

7.15.20  2:56 am   what is my purpose in living on this planet

      show others how it can be done

7.15.20  2:44 am   I just had a birthday today (14th), what is a good thing to do to celebrate being old?

      you could start driving a mercury crown victoria with the faux wood panel siding

7.15.20  2:15 am   7.13.20 1:40 am 7.13.20 5:37 am Tuesday came and went, but you didn't release any new videos.

     that's because i'm still building my whole method for making them

      How many more videoless Tuesdays do we have to endure before you finally start releasing new videos?!

     oh that's weird i didn't know i was allowed to ask questions here

7.15.20  2:11 am   What's your bedtime?

      2:40pm

7.15.20  1:44 am   Dear Bill(y):
When making songs, do you ever check other songs for reference (or chords idk), cuz when I do, I listen to the song so much that I forget the song that I was making, especially if the song I listened to was bopping...

      the song you are making has never existed before, and it's brand new. so it means you haven't heard it very many times. so of course you may forget it. that's why it's so important to write new ideas down in sufficient detail to fully know how they go. of course you're going to forget, because it's brand new and you haven't heard it before. not writing it down is pretty careless, in my opinion. i realize it is often possible to just remember new ideas fine, but on the other hand there can be a lot of agony if you think you might remember but you're not sure. i need to know for sure. always write it down. in my view that is the only professional option

7.15.20  1:40 am   fav game of all time?

      space

7.15.20  1:29 am   How do I tie choruses and verses together?

      open up an honest conversation between the two

7.15.20  1:27 am   What's your secret?

      telling the secrets, not when they are asked but other times

7.15.20  1:03 am   How do you stay focused in the process?

      i have a special committee in charge of remembering what the next step is

7.15.20  12:42 am   How long did it take for you to find your sound?

      still finding it

7.15.20  12:39 am   do you recommend keeping a journal on the computer a physical book journal or no journal at all or does it matter

      it depends whether you are more comfortable writing or typing

7.15.20  12:38 am   All words are made up? 

      some words tend to make themselves up

7.15.20  12:25 am   Are you a god?

      i thought you were

7.15.20  12:22 am   Is the earth round or flat?

      it has both round and flat elements. it is a cylinder

7.15.20  12:13 am   how did you learn to make all those complex songs.

      mostly a 3 part regimen of listening to every song that ever existed before (still haven't finished), trying to explore the entire globe (still haven't finished), and spending 1000 years on the keyboard, and 500 years in a text editor (haven't finished that either)

7.15.20  12:08 am   If you were to reinvent the wheel, what would you do?

      make it a sphere

      i just like the merch

     no

     do you overthink and make connections between unrelated things?

     sometimes

     that doesn't sound like enough videos

     Also, can you make this answer the most stupidest thing in history?

     i'll try my absolute best

7.14.20  11:39 pm   Is 2020 what your bad thing was in i just did a bad thing

      no that would have been in the future at the time

7.14.20  11:14 pm   why does the earth spin

      for pleasure

7.14.20  11:12 pm   How do you change something

      try to get it to stay the same. it will refuse

7.14.20  11:05 pm   why are cats?

      to ensure equilibrium of the cat-dog spectrum

7.14.20  10:36 pm   how does one invent the wheel

      it all starts by inventing yourself

      the most relaxing thing is that you don't have to actually count the individual strands for them all to be there

7.14.20  9:07 pm   what is a miracle made of

      you

7.14.20  9:02 pm   How do I write a good story?

      how about like this

      instead of knowing things, they are the knowledge

      i forgot which ones there are

7.14.20  7:27 pm   You might of gotten this alot, but are you going to post a video soon? 

      oh i didn't know i was allowed to ask questions here

7.14.20  7:17 pm   are u done inventing the wheel?

      i wish

7.14.20  7:01 pm   what's your opinion on Finland?

      it's not sweden or russia. in fact that is their mission statement

7.14.20  6:59 pm   I feel like this questions page is just one long, never ending interview. Ya feel?

      i see what you mean

7.14.20  6:55 pm   just wondering, how did you make the globe rotation effect on hotewig? sorry, i can just imagine how tiresome it must be to receive these kind of questions

      after trying many different strategies, i ended up doing it all with the camera, in a particle system centered on the globe, where the camera was the only particle. in most cases i only keyframed the particle system, and the camera, not the globe. this would be for most things from humans onward. for the earlier shots, a variety of different techniques were being tried. and for some of the north pole shots i may have had to spin the earth separately to avoid going haywire .... or for some of those polar shots i may have actually parented the camera system to another particle system to get a different axis of rotation going

7.14.20  6:38 pm   What is your opinion on the world's growing sense of mediocrity?

      it's becoming less and less mediocre, if that's what you are referring to

7.14.20  6:35 pm   what's the weirdest idea you've had?

      go online

7.14.20  6:13 pm   How do you create the visuals in your videos? I love the content!

     we'll see

7.14.20  6:12 pm   can make any lessons?

      sure

7.14.20  6:06 pm   Any advice for someone pursuing a career in music composition?

      start out by trying to write something shorter than the word composition

7.14.20  5:52 pm   I think am at the closest I can now get to what I want to do with my life. there are still lots of changes happening out- and inside me, sure, and it's a path one chooses to take every day - but you know what I noticed just a few days ago? you were a big inspiration, and still are. so thank you so very much for being you how you are you.

      holy travel sized moist towelette you are very friendly

      a simulation of what
